title: 英打練習 Lv.1 - 字母位置記憶
description: 適合初學者的英打練習，專注於記憶鍵盤字母位置。全小寫練習，搭配鍵盤提示。目標 WPM: 20

questions.text: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog

title: 英打練習 Lv.2 - 進階訓練
description: 提升英打速度與準確度，練習常用句型與符號。目標 WPM: 50

questions.text: Programming is the art of telling another human what one wants the computer to do.
JavaScript is a versatile language used for both frontend and backend development.
The best way to predict the future is to invent it - Alan Kay.
Clean code is simple and direct. Clean code reads like well-written prose.
First, solve the problem. Then, write the code - John Johnson.
Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes - Oscar Wilde.
Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
The most important property of a program is whether it accomplishes the intention of its user.
Simplicity is the soul of efficiency - Austin Freeman.
Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding - Burt Rutan.

title: 英打練習 Lv.3 - 專業級訓練
description: 挑戰專業級英打速度，練習技術文章與程式碼片段。目標 WPM: 70

questions.text: function calculateWPM(correctChars, seconds) { return Math.round((correctChars / 5) / (seconds / 60)); }
The async/await syntax in JavaScript provides a more elegant way to work with promises than traditional callback chains.
TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, catching errors at compile-time rather than runtime for safer code.
React's virtual DOM efficiently updates only the parts of the page that have changed, improving performance.
const result = await fetch('/api/data').then(res => res.json()).catch(err => console.error(err));
Machine learning algorithms can identify patterns in large datasets that would be impossible for humans to detect manually.
Microservices architecture breaks down applications into smaller, independently deployable services for better scalability.
Git version control enables teams to collaborate on code efficiently by tracking changes and managing merge conflicts.
Docker containers package applications with all dependencies, ensuring consistent behavior across development and production.
Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines automate testing and deployment, reducing manual errors.
